TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutodiscoverService extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeServiceBase
Public NotInheritable Class AutodiscoverService Inherits ExchangeServiceBase

Docs.summary: Represents a binding to the Exchange Autodiscover service.

remarks.para: In the Exchange Web Services (EWS) Managed API, the class contains the methods and properties that are used to set user credentials, identify EWS endpoints, send and receive SOAP messages, and configure connections to EWS. To perform an operation by using the EWS Managed API, you must first set up the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Domain { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the domain that the specified Autodiscover service is bound to.

remarks.para: When the class is instantiated with a domain name, that domain name is used to determine the Autodiscover service URL automatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableScpLookup { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the instance should perform a Service Connection Point (SCP) lookup when determining the service URL.
Docs.value: true if the instance should perform an SCP lookup; otherwise, false.

Docs.param: The SMTP addresses of the domains.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the server version to be used for operation requests.
The domain setting names.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the specified settings for a set of domains at the specified URLs with the specified server version.
Docs.returns: A collection that contains the responses for each individual domain.

remarks.para: The returned object contains the settings for the domains.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property GetScpUrlsForDomainCallback As Func(Of String, ICollection(Of String))

public: property Func<System::String ^, System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::String ^> ^> ^ GetScpUrlsForDomainCallback { Func<System::String ^, System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::String ^> ^> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::String ^, System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::String ^> ^> ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the delegate used to resolve Autodiscover Service Connection Point (SCP) URLs for a specified domain.The property is applicable to clients that target versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013, including Exchange Online.
Docs.value: The delegate used to resolve Autodiscover SCP URLs for a specified domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Autodiscover.GetUserSettingsResponse GetUserSettings(string userSmtpAddress, valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Autodiscover.UserSettingName[] userSettingNames) cil managed
Public Function GetUserSettings (userSmtpAddress As String, ParamArray userSettingNames As UserSettingName()) As GetUserSettingsResponse

Docs.param: The SMTP address of the user.
The user setting names.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the specified user settings for an SMTP address.
Docs.returns: The requested settings for the specified user.

remarks.para: The method does not follow address and URL redirections. Only the requested user settings are retrieved, if they exist.

example.para: The following code example shows how to use the method to retrieve the UserDisplayName, CasVersion, and other user settings requested in the parameter. The user setting name and value are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Autodiscover.GetUserSettingsResponseCollection GetUsersSettings(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> userSmtpAddresses, valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Autodiscover.UserSettingName[] userSettingNames) cil managed
Public Function GetUsersSettings (userSmtpAddresses As IEnumerable(Of String), ParamArray userSettingNames As UserSettingName()) As GetUserSettingsResponseCollection

Docs.param: The SMTP addresses of the users.
The user setting names.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the specified settings for a set of users.
Docs.returns: The responses for each individual user.

remarks.para: This method applies to versions of Exchange starting with Exchange 2010, including Exchange Online. Use the method if you are targeting an Exchange 2007 mailbox.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsExternal As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> IsExternal { Nullable<bool> get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Autodiscover service that the URL points to is internal (inside the corporate network) or external (outside the corporate network).
Docs.value: true if the domain is internal; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: The property is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if this instance has been created with a domain name and no method has been called, or if this instance has been created with a URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Autodiscover::AutodiscoverRedirectionUrlValidationCallback ^ RedirectionUrlValidationCallback { Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Autodiscover::AutodiscoverRedirectionUrlValidationCallback ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Autodiscover::AutodiscoverRedirectionUrlValidationCallback ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the redirection URL validation callback.

public: bool TryGetPartnerAccess(System::String ^ targetTenantDomain, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::ExchangeCredentials ^ % partnerAccessCredentials, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Uri ^ % targetTenantAutodiscoverUrl);

Docs.param: The target domain or user email address.
The partner access credentials.
The Autodiscover URL for the specified tenant.
Docs.summary: Attempts to retrieve the partner access information for the specified tenant.
Docs.returns: true if the partner access information was retrieved; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the Autodiscover service.

remarks.para: When the class is instantiated with a domain name, that domain name is used to determine the Autodiscover service URL automatically.
